description: Public Private Partnerships for Local Service Delivery

subproject.description:
Operational cost at APRC for the implementation of the Public Private Partnerships for Local Service Delivery Project that works to increase the access of the poor to basic services such as water, waste, energy, education and health by promoting inclusive partnerships between local government, business and communities.

In 2007 project description was changed from PPPUE to PPPSD and extended to 2009.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: PPPSD Oper cost for 2005-2010
